tool_description: Searches historical auction records across multiple auction houses to find sales of the specified artwork, providing detailed transaction information.

artwork_title.description: Title of the artwork to search for

search_start_date.description: Start date for auction search range

search_end_date.description: End date for auction search range

minimum_price.description: Minimum sale price to filter results

include_unsold.description: Whether to include lots that failed to sell

error_messages: Invalid date range: search_end_date must be after search_start_date and both must be valid ISO 8601 dates.
No auction records found: No matching auction records were found for the specified criteria.
Invalid price filter: minimum_price must be a non-negative number.
Auction house not recognized: One or more specified auction houses are not in the database.
usage: Provide artwork details and date range to search auction records. The tool returns detailed information about all matching auction sales including prices, dates, and buyer/seller information when available.

total_records_found.description: Number of matching auction records found

auction_dates.description: Dates of auctions where the artwork appeared

sale_prices.description: Hammer prices for sold lots (in original currency)

auction_houses.description: Names of auction houses that sold the artwork
